entry.title: On this #TransgenderDayOfRemembrance, remember that our trans...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

On this #TransgenderDayOfRemembrance, remember that our trans and nb siblings are #MoreThanaNumber

The Marsha P. Johnson Institute

‚ÄúTo be remembered by those left behind is to live forever.‚Äù

We celebrate BLACK trans people, our lives and full experience today. And everyday.

Last year we wan...ted to shift the focus from numbers to names. And this year, we want to continue to disrupt the idea that BLACK trans people only count in death. Our lives are more than a trending topic in the media more than a hashtag on social media, more than a talking point on the morning news and more than a number. At the start of each year, a countdown begins on the number of murdered trans people leading up to #TransgenderDayofRemembrance with little to no regard for our names. We here at MPJI are shifting the narrative. Don‚Äôt call us a number. We have names. We have lives. Honor them as such.

See More

entry.title: Peace to all these beautiful souls and all trans and nb siblings...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Peace to all these beautiful souls and all trans and nb siblings we‚Äôve lost on this day of remembrance.

If you find yourself struggling today please take care of yourself. Trans Lifeline provides peer support for the trans and nb community that‚Äôs been divested from police since day one. Run by and for trans people. 1 (877) 565- 8860

Locally, Queer Asterisk provides queer-informed counseling services, educational trainings, and community programming. 720-507-6161...
info@queerasterisk.com

#BlackTransLivesMatter #BlackNBLivesMatter #TransgenderDayOfRemembrance #AllBlackLivesMatter

https://www.google.com/‚Ä¶/transgender-day-of-remembrance-20‚Ä¶/

See MoreIt's the deadliest year on record for the trans community.

elle.com

entry.title: We know someone out there can help out our amazing sister-owned...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We know someone out there can help out our amazing sister-owned Whittier Cafe!

Whittier Cafe

Dear Whittier Family,

We need your help. Cafes are required to close inside seating again. To keep business going, we need to enclose our patio. Traditional com...panies are ridiculously expensive. So....

We are looking to hire someone in the community to help us creatively enclose our patio. Is that you? Do you know someone? Do you have an idea on how we should do it?

Please reach out and most importantly... Share This!

See More

entry.title: Sharing this again because we aren‚Äôt hearing nearly enough...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Sharing this again because we aren‚Äôt hearing nearly enough noise on this üîä
Will post action steps later today.
#StopWarOnTigray #SayNoToWarEthiopia

+3Tigray Communities

What‚Äôs Happening in Northern Ethiopia (Tigray)?

With the war that is currently being waged against the people of Tigray, it is essential that we be the voice f...or our voiceless Tigrayan brothers and sisters back home. The infographic below provides a brief summary of what‚Äôs going on, the events that have led up to this point, and what we can do to make a difference!

Please refer to the following link (https://linktr.ee/istandwithtigray) for a full list of resources in the fight for our people including the Campaign for Peace petition and ‚ÄúI STAND WITH TIGRAY 2020‚Äù Google Drive folder which houses email templates, phone scripts, and contact information for organizations and elected officials.

Let‚Äôs come together to support our people! #IStandWithTigray ‚ù§Ô∏èüíõ‚úäüèæ

In case you aren‚Äôt aware, our family are losing beloveds to genocide. #SayNoToWarEthiopia #StopWarOnTigray

Millete Birhanemaskel

#TigrayGenocide day 11

The sugar factory in Tigray was bombed
Airport in Bahir Dar bombed
Airport in Gondar bombed...
Three Missile strikes in Eritrea

The geopolitics are complex here. When will we stop this?!

entry.title: #DEMANDS...
entry.content:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
